eg.edittools

Interface AddableEditTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExchangeEditor, Finder

    public interface AddableEditTool
    The interface to create an "edit tool" that has access to the currently viewed EditableDocument and whose view can be added to the ToolPanel in the main window

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTool(javax.swing.JButton closeBt)
      Creates the edit tool.
      void end()
      Ends the edit tool.
      void setEditableDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
      Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
      java.awt.Component toolComponent()
      Gets the Component that represents the view of the tool.

    • Method Detail

      • createTool

        void createTool(javax.swing.JButton closeBt)
        Creates the edit tool. The specified button has got the action to close the tool panel added and must be shown in the view.
        Parameters:
        closeBt - the closing button

      • toolComponent

        java.awt.Component toolComponent()
        Gets the Component that represents the view of the tool. The Component is displayed in the main window when it is selected in the menu.
        Returns:
        the Component

      • setEditableDocument

        void setEditableDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
        Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
        Parameters:
        edtDoc - the EditableDocument

      • end

        void end()
        Ends the edit tool. Called when the program is exited
